metadata.title: CVE-2022-36648 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The hardware emulation in the of_dpa_cmd_add_l2_flood of rocker devicemodel in QEMU, as used in 7.0.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers tocrash the host qemu and potentially execute code on the host via execute amalformed program in the guest OS.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
